Description: Allows you to set the value of a [game_counter](../game_counter) and have it trigger if the set value matches the game_counter's target value.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: The game_counter_set will be removed from the game after firing.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Name of the [multisource](../multisource) entity that (temporary) locks this {{ entname }}. If master is specified the {{ entname }} will be disabled and won't work. When [multisource](../multisource) entity is triggered/being triggering by all possible inputs, the {{ entname }} will work again and can set game_counter value. When [multisource](../multisource) lost at least one input signal, the entities becomes locked again.
Value to set the game_counter's value to. Note that if the targeted game_counter is set to fire if over the value, it will trigger as well.
Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to set it's target game_counter value. Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can be kill-targeted.
Name of game_counter to set the value.
Entity to remove when value is set.
